_sText:
The map where it rains men! Counter terrorists to be precise...

The fifth from my Aperture Science Experiment Series!

In this universe, Aperture science simulates combats in order to study the subjects (you and the bots), each map is enclosed in a cube, where anyone who attempts to escape will certainly die! So fight for your survival and win!

A remake from my first map uploaded

GAMEPLAY
The CT spawn on a chamber with glass breakable floor, with no buy zone and knifes. Terrorist spawn below and they can buy weapons (Buy zones are the 2 small areas marked on the ground). Then just start breaking the glass, you can try to kill them before they hit the ground and see the ragdolls fall down. Ct's have to find they're way down and knife Terrorists.

2 TERRORIST
30 COUNTER TERRORIST

Features
-New Minigame gameplay!
-3D skybox
-A unique chamber based on Aperture Science
-High Dynamic Range Lighting!
-Reflections
-Free of bugs
-Custom Textures

developed by Eugenio 'motanum' Roman
bugs, comments, suggestions to agent_2114@hotmail.com

If you take this map for your server online DONT FORGET TO SEND ME YOUR I.P. adress so I CAN JOIN along!

More maps from me to come

I and Madz for testing
See screenshots

Installation, just paste the .bsp on your maps folder for counter strike source

Default should be Files\Steam\steamapps\Account_Name\counter-strike source\cstrike\maps
